body_html: Hey @angersson! Thank you for your reply! The problem was there. I tried also--data_dir but didn't work first, until I inspected the code and found out that when using a custom data set, one should use --data_dir, but in addition explicitly set the--data_urlto the empty string.
body_text: Hey @angersson! Thank you for your reply! The problem was there. I tried also--data_dir but didn't work first, until I inspected the code and found out that when using a custom data set, one should use --data_dir, but in addition explicitly set the--data_urlto the empty string.
body: Hey @angersson! Thank you for your reply! The problem was there. I tried also` --data_dir ` but didn't work first, until I inspected the code and found out that when using a custom data set, one should use `--data_dir`, but in addition explicitly set the` --data_url `to the empty string.
